categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A minor battle between the Rebel Alliance and the Empire took place on Talus during the Galactic Civil War. The battle costed the Imperials an AT-AT, an AT-ST, and one TIE/sa bomber.
The wreckage was not removed by the Talusian government, and the battlefield remained as a historical site.[source?]

The Imperial vs. Rebel Battle was a point of interest in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. This point of interest was added to the game with the update named "Publish 1", released on August 3, 2003.
